harika ötesi bir oyun değil. 3-4 kişi birleştimi oyundan sizi atabiliyorlar. Birlik olup size istediğini yapabiliyorlar. Bu yönü kötü ama stres atmak istiyorsanız birebir güzel vakit geçireceğiniz bir oyun. Asla para harcamayın oynadıkça güzel silahlar çıkacaktır. saygılarımla.
acayip güzel bi oyun yeni çıkmış

Gra, która na przestrzeni czasu przeszła dużo zmian. Pamiętam moje pierwsze kroki w tej grze i wygląd jej to zmiana jest ogromna - szczególnie jeżeli chodzi o otwieranie skrzyń i dropy kos :P

Basically I was enjoying this game few years ago, but now this game is the same as it was a few years ago.
Valve is not adding new features, new content. this game is only popular for it's simplicity and low  hardware requirements. The game created some kind of cult of people closed to new experiences, they will never try new games because they were growing with counter-strike. The game is filled with toxic people, if you try your best they will scream and try to kick you from the game.
